description: Ideal for young families! This spacious 3-bedroom home is tucked inside the complex, featuring a sunny south-facing yard that opens onto your own private playground. Recently updated with fresh paint and brand-new carpet, it feels bright and move-in ready. Just steps from Richard Bulpitt Elementary and Willoughby Town Centre—parks, shops, and amenities are all walkable. Located in a family-friendly, well-run strata, you'll enjoy a true sense of community. The main level offers an open, flexible layout with a powder room, while upstairs has 2 full baths. Pet- and rental-friendly too—perfect for your lifestyle!
